controller
Class TwitterCommand

java.lang.Object
  controller.TwitterCommand

public class TwitterCommand
extends java.lang.Object

This class specifies the tweeting behavior. It has methods to open the browser and tweet entries to Twitter.

Author:
Fernando , Mikus Lorencs

Constructor Summary
TwitterCommand(TwitterAccount twitterAccount, Controller control)
           
 
Method Summary
 int addPIN(java.lang.String pin)
          Attempts to authenticate using the provided PIN and saves the info into the twitterAccount object.
 void backupAccount()
          Backs up the current account and makes a new account object (in case user cancels authentication)
 void initiate()
          Invoked when user wants to authenticate an account from the day view or re-authenticate another account from the preferences window.
 boolean isTwitterReady()
          Returns true if the twitter account is ready to be used, otherwise false
 void openBrowser(java.lang.String url)
          Opens the user's default web browser with the URL selected
 void resetAccount()
          Sets the account to the previously saved twitterAccount in the case that a user cancels the authentication proccess or doesn't save the preferences (hits cancel)
 void resetAcountInfo()
          Clears any account pointers and makes a new account (for when user hits "remove account" in preferences)
 void setTwitterReady(boolean b)
          Sets the twitter account ready or not.
 int tweet(java.lang.String tweetString)
          Tweets the specified string.

Constructor Detail

TwitterCommand

public TwitterCommand(TwitterAccount twitterAccount,
                      Controller control)
Method Detail

initiate

public void initiate()
Invoked when user wants to authenticate an account from the day view or re-authenticate another account from the preferences window. Saves the old account to a temporary pointer (in case user cancels) and instantiates a new twitter account for which it attempts to gain authentication

openBrowser

public void openBrowser(java.lang.String url)
Opens the user's default web browser with the URL selected

Parameters:
url - The address of the website

addPIN

public int addPIN(java.lang.String pin)
Attempts to authenticate using the provided PIN and saves the info into the twitterAccount object.

Parameters:
pin -
Returns:
1 if the PIN is successfully authenticated

tweet

public int tweet(java.lang.String tweetString)
Tweets the specified string.

Parameters:
tweetString - string to tweet
Returns:
returns 1 if tweet is successful, otherwise 0

resetAccount

public void resetAccount()
Sets the account to the previously saved twitterAccount in the case that a user cancels the authentication proccess or doesn't save the preferences (hits cancel)

isTwitterReady

public boolean isTwitterReady()
Returns true if the twitter account is ready to be used, otherwise false

Returns:
Returns true is the twitter account is ready, otherwise false

setTwitterReady

public void setTwitterReady(boolean b)
Sets the twitter account ready or not.

Parameters:
b - a boolean specifying the status of the twitteraccount.

resetAcountInfo

public void resetAcountInfo()
Clears any account pointers and makes a new account (for when user hits "remove account" in preferences)

backupAccount

public void backupAccount()
Backs up the current account and makes a new account object (in case user cancels authentication)
